website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Crazy Explosive 2017 is a versatile option for any player. It has excellent cushioning, support, and traction. Quick guards may find an issue with the stiff upper; however, if you are a big man looking for solid support and impact protection, this may be a good option for you.
pros: A lot of wearers are pleased with the step-in comfort that these Adidas shoes provide
Most reviewers report that the shoe has excellent traction
Several comment that the Boost cushioning provides great impact protection
The same can be expected from the Harden Vol
Some users note that the shoe provides great support
The mesh upper seems to be durable, according to several testers
The shoes fit true to size, a lot of users observe
A few buyers say that the Adidas Crazy Explosive 2017 looks fantastic
cons: A good number of users comment that the upper is very stiff
Majority of users say that the traction wears down just after a few games
Players report of having the same issue with the Hyperdunk X
A few users find these Adidas basketball shoes heavy, bulky, and a bit uncomfortable
The shoes look ugly, several testers say
They don’t recommend these for casual use

customer_reviews.title: Bounce is life despite...
customer_reviews.text: The bounce cushioning is extremely good at shock absorption. I'm 260 and when I land there is no jolt through my legs and my feet and ankles don't get swiss anymore. The material and for and finish is world class. The lock down is above average. The only draw back is that they do not breath at all as the material is built for support and protection. My son has the prime net version and it's a trade off... less support for breathability and comfort... your preference will be based on those needs. Top notch comfort and bounce makes this a recommendation by me anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toes went Numb: Horrible Fit
customer_reviews.text: I've worn many basketball shoes over the years, all size 11 with no problems. These are so narrow and pit so much pressure from the sides that one game of basketball made my big toes go numb and the side of my feet ache. These are the worst shoes I have used in the past 5 years. Do not believe the reviews unless you wear a very small size. If you wear an 11 or bigger like me don't even bother.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great support and comfort. Excellent for bad ankles
customer_reviews.text: overall loved these shoes. I bought for daily wear to help stabilize some very bad ankles. Pretty much all other tennis shoes I’ve gotten (even high tops) I have issues with rollover. These are great! Have a nice wide base/bottom. Slightly tight around the metatarsal area - seemed a little narrow for listed size but have broken in with time. Could use a little better arch support. (Hence 4 instead of 5 stars). I ended up needing inserts which made them even tighter around the forefoot. But they have stretched out with continued wear. Once broken in these are incredibly comfortable tennis shoes even after long days of being on your feet/walking. Will definitely get again when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: SJ from Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to break in
customer_reviews.text: This shoe really took it's time to break in. The toe box was just too narrow. The side of my pinky toe was just hurting too much. I played through the pain and finally it is broken in after 3 months.... After that, it was comfortable. Length was good just not the width of the shoe. Traction was good for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe but little wide
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable. padding is great. The only downside is they are little wide at the toes and slightly heavy. So it made my game a little slower but decided it was better overall since my feet feel great after playing for couple of hours. If I still played high competitive I would look for other shoes but these are good for 2-3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZE
customer_reviews.text: DONT ORDER THE WOMENS 12/ MENS 9.5 expecting a WOMENS 9.5, because they will send a MENS 12.
customer_reviews.author: Studman12

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has only worn a few times, but he loves them. He said they are a perfect fit and height. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Bought for my 12 year old, size 8, true to size. Summer basketball league. Only complaint is they are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Haydee

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are Tough/hard to walk in. Not as comfortable to walk in as the ones you buy at the store
customer_reviews.author: SJA

customer_reviews.title: The shoes smaller than the size on the label.
customer_reviews.text: The design and build quality was good. The shoes smaller than the size on the label.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Arrived And Fit As Expected
customer_reviews.text: The pair came in a non-standard box brand new without any issues whatsoever. I have the same pair of Adidas Crazy Explosives that I purchased from the store and they look identical. I wore the shoes a few times and they fit exactly the same. I love these shoes!! Shipping was pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit. Good traction
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit. Good traction. Light weight. This is my 2nd Boost shoes. I also have a Prime Knit Crazy Explosive and their perfect for playing Hoops. Will recommend. For the seller, Item as described. Fast shipping. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Wore out Fast
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very tight at the start, took about a month to break in playing a few nights a week. Sadly they have already been replaced after about 8-9 months of use with tearing and ripping in multiple places on the sides. I contacted the company but they never bothered to get back on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Swarden

customer_reviews.title: Model is fit a little bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Have lightweight model of this shoes (size 10), it was a little bit narrow. Have read a comment about narrow fitting and ordered, thought that it will be ok for me, but not. It's not critical and will fit for few weeks. So, looks like this model has been made for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Never know what you’re gonna get
customer_reviews.text: It came in a beat up adidas shoe box from a different shoe. Someone tried on the sneakers so they did not feel like a brand new out of the box fresh pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer kid

customer_reviews.title: Sized as advetised
customer_reviews.text: I had these sent to have softball cleats made out of them because I can’t find softball cleats in a 4E that are anywhere close to giving enough room in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Good fit to size and light but supporting design. Excellent basketball shoe and at a fair price point.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes for basketball. He had a pair from 2015 and now the 2017 model.
customer_reviews.author: Nom De Plume

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great support and foot padding, don’t breath all that well. I added the yellow shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, heavy, not breathable
customer_reviews.text: Stiff! Makes it hard to accelerate. Already bought a shoe with mesh top to replace these. Also not breathable and heavy. Would have returned these but no return paper work was included. Definitely would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hite

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with purchase and would like to recommend everyone to buy this item. They fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Observator

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: We have to use arch supports but they will not fit with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: a.wilbanks89

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size shoe in box!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 7 and the box had size 7 on it but the shoe was a 6. Very heavy so I would would have sent them back anyway.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair. Very stable yet soft on the knees, exactly what i was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: El Barako

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but horrible shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The packaged it in a bag and the box fell apart hen I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S.

customer_reviews.title: The torsion system is very good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, extremely comfortable, fit as expected and the materials are great. The torsion system is very good, it's very hard to get an ankle injury
customer_reviews.author: JoaoMossa

customer_reviews.title: I wear a lot of Adidas, always size 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of Adidas, always size 12. This shoe fits well. Docking 2 stars because I received a different color than what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: MNKCguy

customer_reviews.title: shoes do not offer wide sizes
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the narrow width of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for actually playing ball. Great support and traction.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Haliday

customer_reviews.title: I know they were men's but we have been told they make good Volleyball shoes
customer_reviews.text: They were a bit big for my daughter's foot! I know they were men's but we have been told they make good Volleyball shoes. But My daughter said she felt Clusty in them.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bagby

customer_reviews.title: My flat-footed basketball player's new favorite shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Kid's new favorite basketball shoe. His scoring per game has skyrocketed since he got these. Coincidence?
customer_reviews.author: mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: A little tight on heel but all in all a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

product_meta.title: adidas mens Crazy Explosive
product_meta.description: Designed for the bigger, better, faster, and stronger, you wouldn't want to be caught dead without your adidas® Crazy Explosive 2017. Dual mesh and synthetic upper provide a comfortable and breathable environment. Lace-up construction. High-top silhouette provides optimal ankle support. Brand hits throughout including the iconic, welded, three-strip logo. Classic boost cushioning allows for optimal comfort and energy return for a top-notch performance on the court. Rubber outsole provides durable traction to prevent slipping. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 2 oz Shaft: 4 1⁄2 in Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: adidas upper wraps the foot in adaptive support and ultralight comfort; Forged TPU construction adds durability and lightweight stability where you need it most
boost is our most responsive cushioning ever: The more energy you give, the more you get
Anatomical lace system wraps the entire foot and relieves pressure
Grippy rubber outsole wraps up and around midsole
